name: Leaf Rolling
description:
Made for the Cozy Fall Jam 2022, just a game about rolling in leaves. To change the song, find the radio and bump into it! CONTROLS

(Note: This game can be played with mouse and keyboard, but is best experienced with a gamepad controller)

Move

Gamepad (L Joystick)

WASD or Arrow Keys

Toggle Fall or Winter Mode

Gamepad ( X or B )

1  or Backspace

Toggle Tv Effect

Gamepad ( Y )

2  or Return

Toggle Pixelate Effect

Gamepad ( B )

3  or Space

Reset Scene

Gamepad ( Start )

Escape

And that's it, I'll add more here once I've gotten some proper sleep, but enjoy.
